title: Run
lyrics:
Lyric KHAN YOON - Run

[Romanization]

dallyeoga sumi nareul samkilttaekkaji
giren baramman gadeukhae

tteonagan neoui heurin geurimja mani
namgyeojin naegyeote meomulgo isseo

eodum gadeukhadeombang
huimihage boideon neon
mumbakki gunggeumhadago malhaesseo

taeyangeul majuseon neon
hayan haetsare jamgyeo meolli
naegeseo tteonaga sarajyeosseo

himeomneun sigane neol gaduji aneulgeoya
hanjulgi bulbicheul oemyeonhaji aneullae

yeongwonhal geomman gatdeon sunggandeuri
hanadul naegyeoteseo tteonagatjiman

apeumeuro chaewotdeon sunggandeuri
hanadul naege uimiga isseosseo

jinaga bitbaraen gieongman namgyeojinchae
gipeun sangsilman keojyeoganeunde

eollukjin heunjeok jiwonaeneun iri
maeirui nae ilsangi doebeoryeosseo

mami muneojyeo gotongi chajawa nareul bulleo
ssodanaen sangcheoe gadeukhan jinan sigan

yeongwonhal geomman gatdeon sunggandeuri
hanadul naegyeoteseo tteonagatjiman

apeumeuro chaewotdeon sunggandeuri
hanadul naege uimiga isseosseo

I'm running running for you
I'm running running for you
I'm running running for you
I'll never, never give up

I'm running running for you
I'm running running for you
I'm running running for you
I'll never, never give up

Oh
gireul dallyeoga I'm running running for you
apeumdo uimiga isseosseo

mulmite huimihadeon jinankkumdeul
hanadul taeyangarae kkeonaeollyeo
bitnaneun sungganeuro gadeuk chaewo
nalgaereul pyeogo nara ollagallae

I'm running running for you
I'm running running for you
I'm running running for you
I'll never, never give up

I'm running running for you
I'm running running for you
I'm running running for you
I'll never, never give up

[Hangeul]

달려가 숨이 나를 삼킬때까지

길엔 바람만 가득해



떠나간 너의 흐린 그림자 만이

남겨진 내곁에 머물고 있어



어둠 가득하던방

희미하게 보이던 넌

문밖이 궁금하다고 말했어



태양을 마주선 넌

하얀 햇살에 잠겨 멀리

내게서 떠나가 사라졌어



힘없는 시간에 널 가두지 않을거야

한줄기 불빛을 외면하지 않을래



영원할 것만 같던 순간들이

하나둘 내곁에서 떠나갔지만



아픔으로 채웠던 순간들이

하나둘 내게 의미가 있었어



지나가 빛바랜 기억만 남겨진채

깊은 상실만 커져가는데



얼룩진 흔적 지워내는 일이

매일의 내 일상이 되버렸어



맘이 무너져 고통이 찾아와 나를 불러

쏟아낸 상처에 가득한 지난 시간



영원할 것만 같던 순간들이

하나둘 내곁에서 떠나갔지만



아픔으로 채웠던 순간들이

하나둘 내게 의미가 있었어



I'm running running for you

I'm running running for you

I'm running running for you

I'll never, never give up



I'm running running for you

I'm running running for you

I'm running running for you

I'll never, never give up



Oh

길을 달려가 I'm running running for you

아픔도 의미가 있었어



물밑에 희미하던 지난꿈들

하나둘 태양아래 꺼내올려

빛나는 순간으로 가득 채워

날개를 펴고 날아 올라갈래



I'm running running for you

I'm running running for you

I'm running running for you

I'll never, never give up



I'm running running for you

I'm running running for you

I'm running running for you

I'll never, never give up
name: KHAN YOON - Run
